item.description: From: X. (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: : Bonne Année! (Anonymity granted by decision of the Court) Subject: TYPE_SUBJECT_HERE Date sent: Month DD, YYYY, HH:MM +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Gloria SANTONA Cc: Steve EASTERBROOK 【Note: Steve EASTERBROOK was at the time the CEO of McDonald’s Corporation】

item.title: Crime report sent by email, to among other people, Nicole Belloubet, François Molins, Rémy Heitz, Hélène Davo, and Emmanuel Macron
item.description: Date sent: January 25, 2019, at 00:44 (China Standard Time) On January 25, 2019, at 00h44 (China Standard Time), I sent an email to, among other people, Nicole Belloubet, François Molins, Rémy Heitz, Hélène Davo, and Emmanuel Macron. In this email, I alerted them about the critical dysfunctions of the French judicial system. I also provided 7 concrete examples of the serious crime of faux en écriture publique, the falsification/doctoring/altering/forging of a court/public/official/legal document/decision, under articles 441-1 and 441-4 of the French criminal code.

item.title: Email sent to the Minister of Justice, Nicole Belloubet, to beg her to respond to me.
item.description: Date sent : March 19, 2018, at 22:07 (China Standard Time). Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2018-03-19-s-il-vous-plait-madame-belloubet.pdf SUBJECT: PLEASE Dear Madam Minister, I sent you a request last week. I implore you, please give me an answer, even if it’s negative. But please say something. I understand that you must be very busy. You don’t need to respond to me personally. You can delegate this matter to someone else. But please have someone contact me by email quickly.
